description: Wulfric`s Bergmite was the first Pok√©mon sent out to battle in rematch of Ash versus Wulfric. It was matched up against Pikachu. After Pikachu was able to run off the freezing effects of Icy Wind, the match significantly took a turn into Pikachu`s favor and it was quickly able to land a few good hits and finished of Wulfric`s Bergmite with an Iron Tail.
name: Kachikohru (Urup)
